title: A Healthy Perspective on "Becoming One"
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Bob Paul
itunes:summary:
Scripture tells us that two spouses "become one," in marriage. But what does that mean? John, Greg and Erin provide some ideas for how to live in unity with your spouse. .

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Get the book "9 Lies That Will Destroy Your Marriage" with your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-04-20?refcd=1092311

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/a-healthy-perspective-on-becoming-one/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
